feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student clearly describes and demonstrates a working financial application that fetches real-time market data and generates investment memos (multiple stock examples and verification). Implementation details (API key, code, testing) and DRIVER stages support that the tool functions and performs financial tasks, meeting the PASS standard.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates concrete AI integration: they implemented an LLM (Gemini) in the app to generate investment memos from live market data, showed multiple example outputs (Apple, Nvidia, Oracle), and described implementation details (API key, model selector). These show effective, value-adding AI use rather than superficial mention, satisfying the PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "my project for this session was I wanted to basically just create an app that pulls real time market data um from Yahoo Finance"
"I use the driver framework and this is the define and discover portion of that..."

"I verified the solution. I tested it. I used I mean this one for example is American Battery Technology Company. I use Nvidia. I used Apple and I basically just used different stocks and I checked it with actual like results and just to confirm that was real"
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — defined the problem and target users (junior analysts / bankers) and goal to pull live market data; Implement — described API key inclusion and code implementation for fetching data and generating analysis; Reflect — tested and verified results and reflected on use of AI/tools, supporting that the app was built and evaluated.
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly describes and demonstrates a working financial application that fetches real-time market data and generates investment memos (multiple stock examples and verification). Implementation details (API key, code, testing) and DRIVER stages support that the tool functions and performs financial tasks, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "my project for this session was I wanted to basically just create an app that pulls real time market data um from Yahoo Finance"
"this is where my API key is included. Um checks if data exists. Extracts key metrics safely. Generates AI content."
"says Gemini's analyzing Apple U. Uh so basically you would pull my app the instant investment memo and plug in your API key right here."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: defined problem and user (future bankers) and intended value of automating investment memos.
- Implement: described where the API key and AI model (Gemini) are implemented, a smart model selector, and code flow that generates AI content.
- Reflect: reflected on learning and practical uses of AI for debugging and extending the app.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates concrete AI integration: they implemented an LLM (Gemini) in the app to generate investment memos from live market data, showed multiple example outputs (Apple, Nvidia, Oracle), and described implementation details (API key, model selector). These show effective, value-adding AI use rather than superficial mention, satisfying the PASS criteria.
